hero.title: Corebiz Connector: integrate your VTEX store with TikTok Shop in just a few steps
hero.description: Expand your reach and sell more on TikTok. This page ensures you have everything ready before starting the connector setup.

content.title: Before you start (Essential prerequisites)
content.description: Make sure you have the following before starting the integration.

vtexAccount.title: Active VTEX account
vtexAccount.label: VTEX Account
vtexAccount.description: Have products, inventory, and a commercial policy configured (it can be just the main policy). Your VTEX account must be configured as a marketplace.

tiktokSeller.title: TikTok Shop Seller account
tiktokSeller.description: Create your TikTok Shop seller account to start the integration.

alert.title: Important
alert.description: Currently, the Corebiz connector works only with the main VTEX account. For subaccount scenarios, a specific analysis is required.

footer.text: If you already have everything above, you are ready for the next step.

hero.title: Create a TikTok Shop Seller account
hero.description: Creating a seller account is the first step to making your products available on TikTok Shop. With it, you will be able to manage products, orders, deliveries, and payments.

step1.title: Create the seller account
step1.description: Access the Seller Center and start the registration process.

intro.before: When starting the registration, remember to correctly select the
intro.after: . You can create your account using:

documents.title: Required documentation for registration
items: Verification selfies holding the document next to the face (photo visible)

links.title: Useful links — TikTok Shop
links.description: Official documentation and policies to support your setup and operation.

items.accountRights: Rights and rules for the official TikTok Shop account

tiktokSetup.title: TikTok Shop setup
tiktokSetup.description: Let’s prepare your TikTok Shop environment for the integration.

install.title: Step 1 - Install the Corebiz Connector on TikTok Shop
steps: Access your TikTok Shop Seller Center
Navigate to "Apps & Partners" in the main menu
Filter by "Popular platforms" with the value "VTEX"
Select the app "VTEX Sync by Corebiz"
Click "Install" and follow the indicated steps

token.title: Step 2 - Generate the permission token
steps: After installation, access the "App Store" section again
Locate the app "VTEX Sync by Corebiz"
Click the three dots icon (...) next to the app

brands.title: Create and authorize your brands on TikTok Shop
brands.description: Before starting the catalog integration, it is essential to create your product brands. This step prevents blocks or errors during processing. In addition, brand authorization proves that the seller is allowed to sell products on TikTok Shop.
steps: In the Seller Center, click the home icon in the top menu
Include the authorization type and the required document

tip.title: Important tip
tip.description: Make sure the brand naming in TikTok Shop is exactly the same as used in VTEX. This is essential for correct mapping and to avoid product blocks.

configurarConectorVtex.title: VTEX Admin Configuration
configurarConectorVtex.description: In this step, you will configure your VTEX account to allow integration with TikTok Shop through the Corebiz connector.

appKeys.trigger: 1. Generate App Key and App Token
steps: Click on your profile avatar (top right corner).

alert.title: Important
alert.description: The App Token will be displayed only once. Copy it immediately and store it in a secure place. If the token is lost, a new key will need to be generated.

steps.admin: In the VTEX Admin, go to Store Settings → Orders → Settings.

steps.apps: In the VTEX Admin side menu, go to Apps.
steps.search: Search for Corebiz - TikTok Shop Connector.

alert.title: Attention
alert.description: The connector will only work if your store is authorized by Corebiz. You will need to contact the sales team. This app is not free.
